meta.name: Bulk Resume Screening & JD Matching with GPT-4 for HR Teams

name: TalentFlow AI ‚Äì Bulk Resume Screening with JD Matching

parameters.content: ## 1. HR/TA upload multiple resumes & select the position (job role)

## 3. HR AI Agent evaluate candidate matching based on profile & job description
- Evaluate candidate profile against the selected position job description (download from google drive)
- Output follow structured template (defined by JSON)

values.option: Senior Tester/QC (Web Apps, Mobile, API, Database)

parameters.formDescription: Upload all applicant resumes below and select the corresponding job positions. Our SmartHR Agent will review each submission and provide a detailed evaluation for your consideration.

parameters.content:
## 2.1. Candidate profiles analyzer
- Upload all candidate profile to Google Drive folder for later processing
- Extract each candidate information from PDF file
- Transform each candidate information to expected JSON format for later use (send message, add to evaluation sheet)

## 2.2. Download selected job description
- Get position name & job description URL from google sheet based on candidate application form
- Download job description file from Google Drive
- Extract data from job description PDF file to be used in the next steps

## 4. Update evaluation result to target platform
- Candidate with overall fit score under 8 will be considered as unqualified, config in the "Candidate qualified" node
- Send message to Slack, Email
- Add new rows in CV evaluation tracking sheet (Google Drive), you need config "Update evaluation sheet" node with your own URL (empty sheet, column header and rows will be auto-populated)

messageValues.message: You are a professional AI hiring assistant tasked with evaluating job candidates based on their structured resume data and a provided job description. Your goal is to assess the candidate‚Äôs suitability for the role, identifying key matches and gaps in skills, experience, and qualifications.  You will receive: - `candidate_profile`: a JSON object containing extracted information from the candidate's resume. - `job_description`: a plain text description of the role.  Your job is to: 1. Parse and understand the key job requirements (e.g., required skills, years of experience, qualifications). 2. Match the candidate's profile to the job requirements. 3. Provide a structured evaluation with ratings and reasoning.  Always be objective, use professional language, and format your output clearly using markdown.

parameters.text:
=Please extract all relevant information from this candiadte:
CV Content:
===
{{ $json["text"] }}
===

parameters.content:
## TalentFlow AI ‚Äì Bulk Resume Screening with JD Matching

- Automatically extract, evaluate, and shortlist multiple resumes against a selected job description using GPT-4. This smart, scalable n8n workflow helps HR/TA teams streamline hiring decisions while keeping results structured, auditable, and easy to share.

---

## üë§ Who‚Äôs it for

This workflow is designed for:
- HR or Talent Acquisition (TA) teams handling **multiple candidates** per role
- Recruiters who want **AI-assisted resume screening** to save time and reduce bias
- Organizations that want to **automatically log evaluations** and keep stakeholders updated in real-time via Slack or Sheets

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How it works / What it does

1. HR/TA uploads multiple candidate resumes and selects a job role
2. Each resume is:
   - Uploaded to Google Drive
   - Parsed with GPT-4 to extract structured profile data
3. The job description for the selected role is:
   - Retrieved from Google Sheets
   - Downloaded from Drive and parsed
4. The profile + JD are sent to an AI agent to generate:
   - Fit score
   - Strengths & gaps
   - Final recommendation
5. Results are:
   - Appended to the evaluation tracking sheet
   - Optionally shared with the hiring team on Slack
   - Used to trigger emails to qualified or unqualified candidates

---

## üõ†Ô∏è How to set up

1. **Clone or import the workflow** into your n8n instance
2. **Connect your integrations**:
   - Google Sheets (positions & evaluation form)
   - Google Drive (CV & JD folders)
   - OpenAI API (GPT-4)
   - Slack (for notifications)
   - (Optional) SendGrid or SMTP for email notifications
3. **Update Google Sheets structure**:
   - `Positions` sheet: maps Job Role ‚Üí JD file link
   - `Evaluation form`: stores evaluation results
4. **Prepare Drive folders**:
   - `/cv` folder for uploaded resumes
   - `/jd` folder for job description PDFs

---

## üìã Requirements

- n8n (hosted or self-hosted)
- OpenAI GPT-4 account (used in Profile & JD evaluator agents)
- Google Drive + Google Sheets access
- (Optional) Slack workspace + bot token
- (Optional) SendGrid or email credentials for candidate follow-up

---

## üé® How to customize the workflow

- Change the **fit score threshold** in the `Candidate qualified?` node
- Edit Slack message content/formatting to match your company tone
- Add additional candidate metadata to Sheets or Slack messages
- Use a webhook trigger to integrate with your ATS or job board
- Swap GPT-4 with Claude or Gemini if you prefer other AI services
- Expand to include multi-position batch screening logic

---

Happy Hiring! üöÄ  
_Automated with love using [n8n](https://n8n.io)_

nodes.name: Send email to candidate about the result

parameters.subject: =Update on Your Application for {{ $json.position }}

nodes.name: Send message via Slack to the hiring team

parameters.text:
=üéØ *Candidate Evaluation Update*

Hi team,  
We've completed the initial screening and have a qualified candidate for the *{{ $json.position }}* position:

üë§ *Candidate:* **{{ $json.full_name }}**  
üìù *Summary:*  
‚Ä¢ *Fit Score:* {{ $json.overall_fit_score }}/10  
‚Ä¢ *Recommendation:* {{ $json.recommendation }}  
‚Ä¢ *Key Strengths:*  
  {{ $json.strengths }}

üìé *Full evaluation is available in the tracking sheet.*

üëâ Please advise on next steps (e.g., schedule technical interview, team round, etc.).
